DataElement.preferredName: Target Lesion Identification Follow-up Assessment Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator related to target lesion having been evaluated during follow up.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The identification of a lesion that is present at baseline, is measurable and is the primary target of the therapeutic intervention._The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed; an activity that continues something that has already begun or that repeats something that has already been done._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.
